metadata.title: CVE-2020-23267 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac 0.8.0. The gf_hinter_track_process functionin isom_hinter_track_process.c has a heap-based buffer overflow which canlead to a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted media file

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
